name: MeteoStorm (itch)
description:
MeteoStorm is an action packed retro shoot-em-up.  MeteoStorm offers 25 challenging waves of exciting shoot-em-up action!

The Iidrok have initiated their plot to annihilate the human settlement on Lodone VI.  You are the pilot of the Storm the only force that can stand in their way and thwart their evil plans!

Battle through wave after wave of meteors flying on their way toward the surface of planet Lodone VI.  With each wave of meteors the Iidrok have squadrons of scouts, fighters, and their capital ships ready and waiting to jump in and attack!  Dodge meteors, alien ships, and their weaponry to achieve victory!

MeteoStorm runs on Windows or Mac OS X and supports keyboard and gamepad controls.  Players can customize their controls through the Options menu.  MeteoStorm also maintains a high scores table for players to track their skill through the game in retro style.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Windows 10 or Mac OS X 10.15+
  • Intel based CPU or Rosetta emulation
  • Intel HD Graphics or better
  • 8 GBs of RAM
  • 50 MBs of available HD space
  • Customizable controls with gamepad support
